text_block_list.text: The training course is being improved today, so I planned to start training earlier than usual…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: One! Two! Three!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ha… Hmm… I wonder If that last turn wasn't sharp enough. Well then. one more time…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Geez. I know already. Horse girls hate trainers who rush.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: But let me focus just a little bit more. I messed up in the middle of the winning live the other day. didn't I?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Oh. you didn't notice? Then it looks like my recovery was perfect.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: But even if one person didn't notice. a failure is a failure. If I let myself make the same mistake twice, I wouldn't forgive myself.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …After all, I'm a first-class horse girl.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: So please, let me confirm it one more time All you have to do is shift the training time a little.
choice_data_list: All right, let's do it again.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Yes. Let's practice until I'm satisfied one more time.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: My, did I say something funny? I didn't, did I?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ohohoho! There's no way the first-class King would stop practice unsatisfied!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Now, I’ll give you the privilege of playing the music! We're going to raise King's dancing to the ultimate level together!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Now, let's commence training. You're ready, aren't you?
choice_data_list: But we don't have much time…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: What, it's still fine isn't it. You're so impatient.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …In the first place, for the course that I use to have a usage time is a mistake.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: In any case. that's enough chit-chat. Shut up and get ready for training!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Do everything at full power without giving up. That's King's creed. Master both dancing and training perfectly the-
(Ding-dong, ding-dong…)

text_block_list.name: School Announcement
text_block_list.text: It is time to end training. The course will be maintained today so all students are encouraged to prepare to return home as soon as possible.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Ah.
choice_data_list: Don't tell me, you forgot about the maintenance?
Don't tell me, you forgot about the maintenance?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Th… there's no way I'd forget! Even if it's not at school, I can still run. It's no problem.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmph. I don't mind if you leave first. I can at least do normal outdoors exercise by myself.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: C'mon, hurry u-

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Eh?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: But, the plan is ruined and you have your own job don't you? There's no real reason for you to accompany m-

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Th-then accompany me till the end! Cause I'm not letting you leave till I'm satisfied!
choice_data_list: I wouldn't have it any other way!
I wouldn't have it any other way!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ohhohoho! Good answer! I'll be sure to utilize you as much as I like today!
And so, that day I ended up accompanying King Halo's training until she was happy.
